alert.note: Alert for Wilson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 6:56PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Wilson County through 730 PM CDT... At 655 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Neodesha, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, penny size hail, deadly lightning, locally very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Neodesha, Fredonia, Altoona and Benedict. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
